summary: Completed comprehensive testing of OhCampus Iteration 6 features. All 23 backend tests passed. All frontend features working correctly including User Management, Admissions module, Performance Dashboard, and Fee Management college search.
passed_tests: Backend: Admin login (200 OK)
Backend: Counselor login (200 OK)
Backend: GET /api/admin/designations returns 4 designations
Backend: GET /api/admin/users returns counselor users (admin only)
Backend: GET /api/admin/users requires admin role (403 for counselor)
Backend: GET /api/admin/users/team-leads returns Team Leads and Managers
Backend: POST /api/admin/users creates new counselor with designation
Backend: POST /api/admin/users rejects invalid designation (400)
Backend: PUT /api/admin/users/{id} updates counselor
Backend: PUT /api/admin/users/{id} can toggle is_active status
Backend: GET /api/admissions returns admissions for counselor
Backend: GET /api/admissions returns all admissions for admin
Backend: POST /api/admissions creates admission with instalments
Backend: POST /api/admissions with multiple instalments calculates fees correctly
Backend: PUT /api/admissions/{id} updates admission
Backend: DELETE /api/admissions/{id} deletes admission
Backend: GET /api/admin/stats/performance returns stats for admin
Backend: GET /api/admin/stats/performance requires admin or manager (403 for counselor)
Backend: GET /api/admin/stats/admissions-list returns all admissions
Backend: GET /api/admin/stats/admissions-list with college filter works
Backend: GET /api/colleges with search parameter filters colleges
Backend: Colleges have required fields (id, name, city, category)
Backend: Team Lead user exists in system
Frontend: User Management page loads with stats (Total Users, Active, Managers, Team Leads)
Frontend: Add Counselor button (data-testid='add-user-btn') works
Frontend: Add Counselor dialog has all form fields (name, email, password, designation, phone)
Frontend: Designation dropdown shows all 4 designations
Frontend: Team Lead assignment dropdown appears for non-lead designations
Frontend: Form validation shows error for missing required fields
Frontend: Admissions page loads with stats (Total Admissions, Fees Collected, Pending Balance)
Frontend: Add Admission button (data-testid='add-admission-btn') works
Frontend: Add Admission dialog has all form fields
Frontend: College dropdown filters courses correctly
Frontend: Add Instalment button (data-testid='add-instalment-btn') works
Frontend: Instalment fields appear with amount, date, description
Frontend: Fee summary shows Total Fees, Fees Paid, Balance
Frontend: Performance Dashboard loads with 4 key metrics
Frontend: Performance Dashboard Overview tab shows Top Courses and Monthly Trends
Frontend: Performance Dashboard By Counselor tab shows counselor rankings
Frontend: Performance Dashboard By College tab shows college stats
Frontend: Performance Dashboard All Admissions tab shows full list with filters
Frontend: Fee Management page has college search input (data-testid='college-search-input')
Frontend: College search filters dropdown options correctly
Frontend: Search for 'Acharya' shows 1 college found
Frontend: Search for 'PES' shows PES University highlighted
Frontend: Team Lead can access Admissions page
Frontend: Team Lead sees only their team's admissions (0 for new team lead)
seed_data_creation: Database has 8 colleges, 22 courses, 3 counselor users (Demo Counselor, Test Team Lead, TEST New Counselor), 4 admissions by Demo Counselor
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Iteration 6 features tested and working: 1) User Management - Admin can create/edit/deactivate counselors with 4 designations (Admission Counselor, Senior Admission Counselor, Team Lead, Admission Manager), assign team leads to counselors. 2) Admissions module - Counselors can add/edit admissions with candidate details, college/course selection, multiple fee instalments with dates. Stats show total admissions, fees collected, pending balance. 3) Performance Dashboard - Admin/Manager can see total admissions, fees collected/pending, collection rate, stats by counselor, by college, by course, monthly trends, and full admissions list with filters. 4) Fee Management - College search bar filters dropdown options by name/city/category. 5) Team Lead access - Team Leads see only their team members' admissions. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_iteration6_features.py with 23 comprehensive tests.
